title: 9.6 Master Challenge 1
question: Recently Raj bought a new laptop for his studies. He will be using the internet and web browser for his college work. He is not much aware of various software. Help him understand the preventive measures to take while using the internet and web browser. What type of software might he need to install to protect his system?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
